room.title: Limbo
room.description: It seems misty in here, and there is no floor. You float happily and wait for someone to notice you.

room.title: A test room
room.description: The first room is not very interesting, perhaps try an exit.

room.title: A second test room
room.description: This room is quite small. There is nothing here to hold your attention.

room.title: A third test room
room.description: This is a treasure room. There are mounds of gold and jewels on the floor and heavy looking treasure chests.
